definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: I remember once we went to see an open-air movie.
sentences.chinese: 记得有一次去看露天电影。

sentences.english: They saw a film in the open air.
sentences.chinese: 他们看了一场露天电影。

sentences.english: It has high resistance to the interference of industrial electricity and the interference of other atmospherics.
sentences.chinese: 抗工业电干扰及其它天电干扰能力强等。

sentences.english: Many cities and towns host free outdoor movies during the summer.
sentences.chinese: 夏日来临，许多城镇会主办一些免费露天电影。

sentences.english: Finally, I picked up Karen and we headed for the drive-in.
sentences.chinese: 最后，我在开往露天电影场的路上捎上卡伦。

definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to have a power failure/power cut
Lei Gong or Duke of Thunder, the God of Thunder in Chinese mythology
